segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink is just a disaster, completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the counter and down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a rapidly expanding puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of all that wasted water is quite irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the potential damage to the wooden cabinets and floor is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves a faucet running unattended like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to be a huge mess to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it, totally unaware, which is baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach in and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation just screams neglect and avoidable trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
